\def \articleABSTRACT{This paper describes the successful reproduction of a paper I co-authored in 2008 (Eglen and Wong, 2008), as part of the ten year reproducibility challenge.  This work was done in the R programming language, and thanks to the stability of R, the code could be re-run without any problems.  In this paper I discuss the scientific background and the steps needed to recreate the key results from our 2008 paper.}
